subject: Hello
description_text: We need to return the haptics they are working and we have tried everything to get them to work.

conversations.body_text: Hi hanna krause,  Please provide your pedal order information so that I can confirm the exact model. If it is a ProX pedal, you will need to download SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0, then go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware → pedals-prox.sfu After the update is complete, unplug and reconnect both the USB and the power supply, then test again. It should work properly after this process.
Hello, I noticed that you gave us a one-star review. We have replied to you. Please check your spam email.
